item.description:
Join us for a spring time meet-up group! Time to get out of the house for some great exercise and socialization with your dogs! We offer a FREE meet-up group for all friendly dogs to come and play. We have a large indoor playroom and fenced in outdoor area specially designedfor dogs to romp and roll. We provide water, toys, and clean  up. Refreshments for humans too! Please make sure your dog is up to date on Rabies, Distemper, and Bordetella because they will be playing with other dogs. We're excited to meet all your pals and I'm sure they are excited to meet new friends too. Come play!

For additional information you may contact us at: 860-721-8080
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Spring Meet-up!
